mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire (idperson, filling_time, qtnaire_version, score, fyrs_risk, lifetime_risk, risk_crcmale, risk_crcfemale, risk_bra) values (#{idperson}, #{filling_time}, #{qtnaire_version}, #{score}, #{fyrs_risk}, #{lifetime_risk}, #{risk_crcmale}, #{risk_crcfemale}, #{risk_bra});
mapper.update: update questionnaire set score=#{score}, risk_crcmale=#{risk_crcmale}, risk_crcfemale=#{risk_crcfemale}, risk_bra=#{risk_bra}, lifetime_risk=#{lifetime_risk} where idquestionnaire=#{idquestionnaire}
mapper.select: select * from questionnaire where filling_time=#{xxx} limit 1
